title: Recall: When Nehru took Pak to the UN over Kashmir in 1947, and what happened thereafter - The Indian Express
content:
1. Recall: When Nehru took Pak to the UN over Kashmir in 1947, and what happened thereafter  The Indian Express
  2. Sitharaman Corners Congress Over Kashmiri Pandit Exodus, Accuses Nehru Of Taking Kashmir Issue To UN  ABP Live
  3. Why did Nehru internationalise Kashmir issue by taking it to UN, asks Sitharaman in RS  Deccan Herald
  4. Nehru should not have taken Kashmir issue to the UN, says Sitharaman in Rajya Sabha  The Indian Express
  5. ‘Why did Nehru…': Nirmala Sitharaman questions as she rakes up Kashmir issue  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: There has been some debate on whether India chose the wrong path to approach the UN. In 2019, Home Minister Amit Shah said that had Nehru taken the matter to the UN under Article 51 of the UN Charter, instead of Article 35, the outcome could have been different.
